attributes.action: Recover the Brexit divorce bill from MPs who vote for it.
attributes.background: There is no transparency in the calculation of the proposed Brexit divorce bill and therefore no justification for the UK tax payer to foot the bill.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you are concerned about the divorce bill between the UK and EU, but are not sure what action you would like taken.

You might like to sign this petition instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/228306
